messages.content: Hi Please be a senior js developer. I want to make a match of the string “Accl ID = TEST_TEST_1Accl ID = XXX”, the TEST_TEST_1 can be other content but it will always be Letters, numbers and _ symbo. Please make the input as "" and make the output be "Accl ID = TEST_TEST_1Accl ID = XXX"

Hi Please be a senior js developer. Please help me to match a substring in a string: make the input as “<a href = “” Accl ID = TEST_TEST_1Accl ID = XXX” and make the output be “Accl ID = TEST_TEST_1Accl ID = XXX”
